[DQC.US.0004.9286] Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect with a value of -67,500 is not equal to the combined total of Net cash used in operations, Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities and Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities ( -22,348 + -10,783 + -28,793 ) with a value of -61,924.
These values should be equal.
